subject: promote of your products to our community
description_text:
Hi,

EKSIMRacing Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to sim 
racing since 2007. We serve a worldwide community of over 409,000 members.

We would like to promote your pedal set within our community by 
providing full native support for your hardware in our software platform 
and by recommending your brand to our sim-racing users.

To quickly get this exciting project underway, we kindly ask if you 
could provide a complete pedal set featuring haptic feedback. The unit 
can be sent to our lab at the following address for evaluation.

Additionally, if available, we would appreciate receiving any technical 
documentation, SDKs, APIs, or other information required to manage the 
haptic motors and calibrate the 3 pedals.

EKSIMRACING LAB - Harry All
Street: 7 Allee de la petite plaine
City: Noiseau
Country: FRANCE
ZIP: 94880

Thank you.

Best regards,
Harry All | Founder
mailto:info@eksimracing.org
website: https://www.eksimracing.org/
